name: Jumping Man: Mine
description:
Features

  • 100 unlockable achievements
  • Lowest price possible
  • Guarantee that achievements will work

This is a simple idle game, where you click to increment your score and can upgrade how much gold you make per click and passively per second. As of now there are 10 upgrades for both categories, but more will be added soon!

The Story


This is the end of Charles.

He was once an ordinary man, with a simple life and simpler goals. Now, he must mine gold to satisfy his endless greed. He is a hollow man, and his only goal is to mine, one jump at a time.

Failure is not an option. Imperfection is unacceptable. Anything less than perfect is flawed. Welcome to the future.
